title.rendered: New Year, New You Hair Makeover Packages

content.rendered:
Don’t go into 2019 with the same hair as 2018!  New Year New Look You Hair Makeover Packages At Luxe Concept Salon for 2019.

  • $105* Restyle Cut, Glamour Blow-dry, Mask Experience (Value $160) + $25 voucher for your next visit.
  • $155* Restyle Cut, Colour Gloss (Demi), Glamour Blow-Dry, Mask Experience (Value $250) + $25 voucher for next visit.
  • $175* Restyle Cut, Face Frame Foils/Free Hand Highlights, Glamour Blow-dry, Mask Experience (Value $275) + $25 voucher for next visit -Upgrades available for 1/2 head & Full head of Foils upon consult.

*Conditions – not to be used in conjunction with any other discount or vouchers. Only available with Senior Stylist and Stylist levels. Extra charges will apply to over shoulder length hair and thick hair due to extra product usage. Available until 28th February, 2019.

Book Online or Contact Us to make an appointment.

About Luxe Concept Hair Salon – A five star salon experience

Situated in the exclusive Chatswood Chase on Sydney’s lower North Shore, award winning Luxe Hair Salon combines a luxurious experience within welcoming environment. Luxe is made up of a strong team stylists , passionate about offering on-trend hairdressing techniques while remaining dedicated to classic styles.
